result.repo_summary_line: A wallet management system integrating various blockchain functionalities and services.

monorepo_services.name: app
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Sets up an HTTP server with middleware for handling requests and graceful shutdown.

monorepo_services.name: clean_cronjob
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Cleans old cron jobs related to announcements in a scheduled task.

monorepo_services.name: clean_highlight_dapps
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Cleans expired highlights from a database and logs the process.

monorepo_services.name: clean_old_special_offers
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Cleans old special offers from the database based on a configurable time period.

monorepo_services.name: ip_location
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Initializes Sentry for error tracking and downloads a new IP location database.

monorepo_services.name: trigger_announcement
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Triggers an announcement based on configuration and environment variables.
